title: How to live an adventurous life - Quora

response.answer_text: India, eventually known as the land of rich heritage, where brews the panorama of alluring high lands and sizzling rivers, where nights are as exuberant as to fizz up your enthusiasm and stars being presumptuous to pale in the east, preparatory to the rising of the moon. The land that has secured its number in fascinating the tourists from all over the world for its religious and pilgrimage places, gracious mountains and the cities that are the crowning glory of India. But still, when the ball rolls in, to the point of adventure sports in India, people are still unaware of the big game. The adventure sports in India has obscured its presence for a long while, but India has settled its score, as the youth can now fantasize of the great thrill that will revive their good spirits and make their life irrepressible. So here are the five adventure sports in India that will make the youth to presume the lifetime man-oeuvre. 1.PARAGLIDING  Flying the eternal and endless sky where the fresh breeze dances upon your face and a rapturous smile to play along. It can be a lifetime moment that will become an entailing part and essence of your reminiscent memories. You won’t be able to betray any astonishment when you will be pleased to enjoy the sky between the beautiful valleys of Kullu and Kangra, Manali or the Nandi hills of Bangalore that are some of the spots for this bone-chilling adventure sports in India that cannot be abdicated. But the epicenter of this sport is Rajasthan that has provided the youth with great thrilling adventure for a while. 2.SKIING  When one ponders over to think about adventure, you surely can’t miss the snow fever that you will get accustomed to when you are between the snow caps, and riding your way down the snow that can relish and ignite your engine with great rejoicing. Along the snow, there is the gleam of the sun that rides along your pavement, and gorgeous mountains to make you fall in love with the flabbergasting surrounding that dwells cordiality that one cannot forget in his/her entire life. Best spots to make your dream conceivable are Pahalgam and Gulmarg of J&K, Manali, Auli in Uttranchal and Kufri in Himachal Pradesh. 3.ROCK CLIMBING  To be more explicit, Rock climbing is a daredevil task, but still, one of the adventure sports in India that will compel to kick your heels to try it once in a lifetime. Make your way through the rigid mountains that will test your real guts and repay all of your risks that you have faced in the form of happiness which is better not described than imagined, thus compensating all of your expenses. Some of the main spots to start with are Parvati hills in Himachal Pradesh, Shey rocks in J&K, Madhugiri in Karnataka and Pythal Mala in Kerala. 4.TREKKING  A number of mountains, valleys and rhetoric waterfalls, that are just a prologue of an adventure that is full of novelty and thrilling enough to make your heart, beat with more enthusiasm. Even in its abstract form, the notion is generous enough to spread the panorama of wide and heavenly land, that it will be an injustice to keep your feet away from the honor of trekking such a lithosphere that holds the natural flair of making the experience great. Best places to heave a sigh are the Chadar trek in Ladakh, Roopkund in Uttrakhand and Kudremuk in Karnataka. 5.WHITEWATER RAFTING  Get ready to scrap away from your boredom, as you ride along with your companions on the merciless waves of river that mark their way down from the peaks of ingratiating and inducing Himalayas and shake your body in a fit of adventure, with your blood rushing to your head as you spear your way out of the waves. Be it be Rishikesh, Zanskar, Teesta river of Sikkim or Indus in J&K, your excitement and experience will be the one you won’t forget in a hurry and your words will find excellence in telling the story. So don’t let your heels kick off in idleness, let yourself revel in the rapturous adventure, where the whole world will seem to re-echo the wilderness experience, the very sea to ring with it and as you will learn the whispers from your friends, the moon will rose to listen. Make a bold move and try the adventure sports in India in order to live life king size.

The word “Adventure” itself says it all-Let me take you through it…. A-Allow yourself to be different D-Dare to chase your dreams V-Visit places never seen before E-Express your feelings to those who really cares N-Now is the time” its never too late” T-Take a step ahead and be your own “Hero” U-Understand where you actually want to be R-Raise your voice to what seems unfair to you E-Execute your instincts “Its your own life than why to live on strange terms”  “Justify your shadow”- The day when you feel and see that you are fair to your reflection then its the day when you actually start living for your self.
